channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Richmond Fed president urges caution on interest rate cuts because inflation isn’t defeated
item.description: A Federal Reserve official says he supports reducing the central bank’s key interest rate somewhat from its current level.

item.title: Harris heads to the US-Mexico border to face down criticism of her record
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris is making her first visit to the U.S.-Mexico border since becoming the Democratic presidential nominee.

item.title: Trump favors huge new tariffs. What are they, and how do they work?
item.description: Former President Donald Trump has proposed a 60% tariff on goods from China and a 20% tariff on everything else the United States imports.
